item.title: DEFCON Gold Bug Puzzle 2021
item.description: We played the annual Gold Bug puzzle hosted by the DEFCON Crypto and Privacy Village - and we won! Although we were unable to ace the challenge before the game ends, we managed to solve the remaining challenge afterwards. We will be covering all of them in this walkthrough.
